name: part_007
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE3【チラ見せ】 [3OkprzHcirU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: A heartwarming montage featuring a collection of fan messages, letters, and illustrations sent from global fans to support the hololive 6th fes. 'Color Rise Harmony' event.
Footage from the live concert venue showing a massive, energetic crowd cheering, waving colorful lightsticks, and displaying various fan-made signs in anticipation of the show.
